high_descs:
turn around go straight and turn left to reach the desk 
pick up the fruit from the desk
turn right and walk to the  desk lamp in the corner.
turn on the desk lamp
Turn around and walk up to the far side of a desk on your right before facing it.
Pick up a mango from the desk.
Take a step further to the left corner of the desk.
anns.task_desc: Check the mango under the desklamp's light.

high_descs: Turn left and turn right to the desk
pick the mango from the desk
Turn around and move towards the desk lamp
anns.task_desc: switch on the desk lamp to check the mango
